overview: Heather's sister Prinzzess is being released from an insane asylum due to lack of funding for low to moderate risk patients. The last time she was home she broke Heathers nose .Through this stressful time Heathers' friends Shyla and Gracie provide Heather and her mother with moral and sexual support. This is high velocity drama between women with imposing sexual desire!
title: Lesbian PsychoDramas 6
